data.eml:eml: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rafi, Muhammad Ather, Carpenter Muhammad Qasim, James M., Shehzad, Anjum, Zia, Ahmed, Khan, Muhammad Rafique, Mastoi, Muhammad Ishaque, Naz, Falak, Ilyas, Muhammad, Shah, Mazafar, Bhatti, Abdul Rauf (2017): The vespid fauna of Pakistan. Zootaxa 4362 (1): 1-28, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4362.1.1
